titleStmt.title: The triall of the English liturgie, or A copie of a letter, wherein severall exceptions and arguments against the imposition and use of the service book in the English churches, are set forth and discussed. Written by a reverend divine, to his Christian friend, for his private satisfaction in this particular. And now published for publicke good
titleStmt.author: Davenport, John, 1597-1670, attributed name.
